name: DWVO 62-inch Metal Bird Cage: Bird Cage Spacious for Cockatiels, Parrots, Pigeons, Lovebirds, Features Roof Access and Rolling Stand Black
short_description: Introducing the ultimate haven of entertainment for your feathered friends - the Versatile 4-Door Bird Cage. Designed to cater to the needs of small to medium-sized birds, this exceptional aviary provides a captivating and secure environment for your pets to thrive

At the heart of this stunning cage lies a carefully crafted setup that encourages natural behaviors and promotes an enriching lifestyle for your birds. The long bridge, three pendants, and three comfortable perches create a true entertainment paradise, ensuring your feathered companions are constantly engaged and stimulated

Safety is of paramount importance, and this bird cage delivers with its 0.4-inch bar spacing, which prevents your birds from getting their heads or wings stuck. The versatile 4-door design grants easy access for feeding, watering, and close interactions, while the 2 convenient side doors facilitate effortless cleaning and maintenance

Accommodating 2-3 birds with ease, the dimensions of this cage are 17''L × 14''W × 62''H, making it suitable for a variety of species, including parakeets, budgerigars, lovebirds, parrots, cockatiels, and similar feathered friends

The top handle provides convenient portability, allowing you to take your bird's home on the go for travel and camping adventures. Thanks to the 4 universal 360° swivel wheels equipped on this open-top bird cage. Relocate your pet's living space with ease and safety, while the spacious storage rack offers ample space for storing all your bird-care essentials

name: VIVOHOME 54 Inch Wrought Iron Large Bird Flight Cage with Rolling Stand for Parakeets Canaries Cockatiels Lovebirds Conures, Black
short_description: STURDY CONSTRUCTION - Our bird cage is made of the high-quality metal frame which has been tested to ensure durability; Designed with exquisitely nontoxic hammer-pattern paint, which is corrosion-resistant, it ensures not only beauty but also a healthy and safe living environment for birds

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS - The design with a flat top gives you more free space to hang bird toys or put some potted plants to decorate the appearance of your cage, increasing the enjoyment of the bird cage; Different decorations and useful equipment can be hung on either side of the cage or put on the mesh shelf

CONSIDERATE DESIGN - With the design of the considerate 4 universal casters, you can put the cage where you want and it will not run anywhere; The unique latch design is firm and safe, which can prevent the bird from opening the door by itself and ensure the protection; The perch is designed to fit the size of a bird's feet and the breeding box can be hung on either side of the cage

EASY TO CLEAN - Designed with the drawer style tray, all you need to do is to slide out the bottom tray and wash it off, which is easier to observe and clean for you; Additionally, all of the shelves can be easily removed for easy cleaning; Keep a clean and tidy environment and keep your pets healthy

ABUNDANT ACCESSORIES - In addition to the high-quality steel frame bird cage, we also provide you with 4 plastic transparent food boxes, 2 wooden perches and a tray in the cage; Different food boxes can feed different nutritious food to birds, which is conducive to the better reproduction and growth of diverse birds

name: VEVOR 64-inch Open Top Large Parrot Bird Cage with Detachable Rolling Stand for Parakeets Finches Canaries Lovebirds Cockatiels Budgies Small Quaker Conures Flight Birdcage with Swing and Perch
short_description: Bird Paradise: The top of the birdcage can be opened and locked at will, allowing for interaction with pets. The bird flight cage is equipped with 4 plastic feeders, 4 perch stands, a swing, and provides comprehensive living facilities for birds.

Spacious Design: With dimensions of 17.99x13.98x59.45 in/457x355x1510 mm, the parakeet cage features a total height at 64.17 in/1630mm when the top is opened, while the bar spacing is 0.4 inches. This spacious bird cage it can accommodate 2-3 birds, such as lovebirds, long-tailed parakeets, parrots, rainbow lorikeets, and lovebirds.

Secure and Convenient Design: The birdcage comes with 2 doors, and a removable sliding tray for easy cleaning. There are 4 feeding doors on the side panels for easy food and water refills. The bottom is equipped with a red base clip to enhance the stability of the cage.

Mobile Rolling Stand: The budgie cage is equipped with four 360° rotating wheels, and the budgie cage can be disassembled and used separately, suitable for flexible use in different environments. An additional storage shelf on the stand can store bird food, toys, and birdcage cleaning tools.

Durable Structure: The birdcage is made of high-quality iron wire and PP materials, combined with spray painting and baking, to ensure a stable and durable structure. The bottom tray is made of PP and co-polymer material, with strong impact resistance and less prone to deformation, suitable for long-term use.

name: Yaheetech 59-inch Dome Open Top Large Medium Parrot Bird Cage On Stand for Sun Parakeets Conures Quaker Parrot Rolling Cockatiel Bird Cage
short_description: Interactive open top: Our 59-inch birdcage features an easy-to-use play top to keep your bird stimulated and provide both you and your feathery friends with a better interaction way. It includes a perch that keeps the top doors open for the birds to stand on and can be closed to give them a safe enclosed home

Aesthetically-pleasing cage: This nice birdcage boasts curved details such as the dome top and curved legs. Outlined by these rounded simple lines, this birdcage can go well with a variety of modern home decor space, especially the minimalist style

Perfect for small birds: This cage measures 51cm/20inch long, 51cm/20inch wide and 83cm/32.7inch high and with 1.5cm/0.6inch bar spacing. The decent size of this cage provides plenty of living space and room for activity to small birds like canary, cockatiel, lovebirds, etc

Effortless moving: Founded on a rolling stand, this parrot cage can be rolled to anywhere in your home with ease. Four 360-degree swivel casters (2 with brakes) make our birdcage conveniently moved and locked in place at will

Bird & pet parents friendly functions: Thanks to the feeder doors, the two feeders can be accessed outside the cage so that you won’t frighten your easily-scared friends when refilling the feed. Moreover, the extra storage shelf on the stand keeps bird cage cleaning tools, bird seeds and toys handy and neat

name: VINGLI Bird Cage with Wheels, Durable Wrought Iron Parakeet Cage with Slide Out Tray, Black Bird Cages for Parakeets/Lovebird/Cockatiels/Budgies and Other Small/Medium Birds (Large-53 inch)
short_description: Sturdy and Durable Construction: Crafted with premium wrought iron and a corrosion-resistant coating, this flight cage resists chewing and scratches, retaining its polished look through years of daily use.

Interactive Play Area for Bird: Features a ladder, durable wooden perch and stainless steel feeders, creating an exciting space for your birds to play and exercise. Perfect for encouraging natural behaviors.

Ample Interior Space with Secure Access: Generously sized for flocks to perch, climb, and explore comfortably. A reinforced locking mechanism on the door ensures safety while offering hassle-free entry for care.

Effortless Cleanliness: Includes slide-out trays and safety grille, effectively catching droppings and minimizing mess. The double-tray system ensures quick cleaning, keeping your bird's environment fresh.

Convenient Mobility: Equipped with rotating wheels for easy mobility, this cage can be effortlessly moved around. The detachable stand allows for flexibility in placement, whether indoors or outdoors.
product_description: Introductions:Provide your feathered companions with a spacious and secure haven in this 53" Large Flight Bird Cage. Designed for small to medium birds like parrots, lovebirds, cockatiels, and parakeets, this cage offers ample room for flying, playing, and relaxing. Its robust iron construction ensures long-lasting durability, while thoughtful safety features like tight bar spacing and a secure latch keep your pets protected at all times. Elevated on a smooth-rolling stand with a convenient storage shelf, this birdcage combines functionality and style, making it an ideal choice for any home. With its easy-to-clean slide-out tray and practical design, maintaining a clean and healthy environment for your birds has never been easier. Perfect for pet lovers who want a beautiful, versatile, and hassle-free cage solution!Features:1. Extra Spacious for Multiple Birds: With a roomy interior, this flight bird cage is perfect for housing multiple small to medium birds, such as lovebirds, cockatiels, and parakeets. Its versatile design also accommodates small animals like sugar gliders and chinchillas, ensuring a comfortable and lively habitat.2. Enhanced Safety & Security: Tight bar spacing and a sturdy front-door latch provide a safe enclosure for your pets, preventing escapes and ensuring they stay protected. Rest easy knowing your feathered friends are safe even when you're not around.3. Easy Mobility with Detachable Rolling Stand: The cage sits atop a rolling stand with 360° swivel casters for smooth and effortless movement. The stand is detachable, allowing you to place the cage directly on a table or other surface when needed.4. Thoughtful Design for Easy Cleaning: A slide-out tray beneath the cage collects droppings and debris for hassle-free cleaning. The metal grate prevents pets from stepping into the waste, maintaining hygiene and ensuring a healthy environment.5. Durable and Functional Build: Constructed with high-quality iron, this cage is designed for long-lasting use. The sturdy rolling stand elevates the cage to an ideal viewing height, making it an attractive and functional addition to your home or aviary.Specifications:1. Overall Dimensions: (25.4 x 16.5 x 53.9) in / (64.5 x 42 x 137) cm2. Cage Dimensions: (24 x 16.3 x 28) in / (61 x 41.5 x 71) cm3. Front Door Dimensions: (14.8 x 8.2) in / (37.5 x 20.9) cm4. Plastic Bowl Dimensions: (4.1 x 3.1 x 2) in / (10.5 x 8 x 5) cm (Depth: 1.9 in / 4.8 cm)5. Perch Dimensions: (24.3 x 0.7) in / (61.7 x 1.8) cm6. Bottom Grate Dimensions: (24 x 15.4) in / (61 x 39.2) cm7. Material: Iron8. Net Weight: 28.7 lbs / 13 kgPackage Includes:1 x Flight Bird Cage1 x Instruction Manual

short_description: [DIY Birdcage]: This birdcage features 2 perches, a ladder, a swing, and 2 bowls, offering easy customization to suit your bird’s needs. Create a cozy home where your lovely friends can rest and play.

[Medium Bird Cage]: Our pet cage measures 14.17" × 14.57" × 39.37", suitable for medium and small birds such as parakeets, parrots, conures, cockatiels, canaries, etc. The 0.59" bar spacing offers safety, making it a perfect home for your feathered friend.
[Easy to Move]: The birdcage is equipped with 4 universal wheels, making it easy to move and place anywhere - whether indoors or outdoors in the garden.

[Easy Cleaning]: The parakeet cage has a pull-out tray at the bottom. It collects litter and can be easily removed. The entire cage, including the tray, can be quickly rinsed with water. The partition can prevent pet feces and urine from splashing. Your bird will enjoy a clean and refreshed home.

[Easy Assembly]: The package includes all the necessary accessories and tools for assembly. The detailed instructions make the process easier for you. Tip: Using plastic clips and zips ensures the birdcage is more stable and secure.

name: 8 PCS Natural Bird Perch Set - Apple Wood Platforms & Hardwood Branches for Parakeets, Cockatiels, Lovebirds - Natural Cage Accessories, Gym Playstand & Chewing Toys for Small Birds
short_description: 【Selected Natural Wood Variety】: This 8-piece set features a premium mix of authentic apple wood (platforms and straight perches) and assorted natural hardwoods for the forked branches, such as elm or chestnut. These dense, untreated woods provide diverse textures for your birds to safely chew, climb, and exercise.

【Tailored Dimensions for Small Birds】: Includes 2 round platforms (approx. 2.8"-3.1" dia), 3 straight perches (5.9" length, 0.6"-1.0" thick), and 3 forked branches (5.9" length). This variety of sizes is specifically designed for the small claws of Budgies, Lovebirds, and Canaries to ensure a comfortable grip.

【Promotes Natural Instincts】: The textured bark surface mimics a natural forest environment, encouraging essential foot exercise and grip strength. These untreated wood accessories satisfy your bird's instinct to chew and play, keeping them mentally stimulated and physically active.

【Stable & Easy Mounting】: Each perch comes with built-in metal wing nuts and round washers for a secure fit on standard small bird cages. No extra tools are required—simply twist to fix them firmly at different heights to create a multi-level activity center for your pets.

【Complete Cage Enrichment】: Transform a static cage into a dynamic playground. With 8 diverse pieces, you can easily customize your bird's habitat, providing various spots for resting, playing, and grooming, making it a high-value addition for any avian enthusiast.

name: Yaheetech 54" Large Flight Bird Cage for Parrots Macaw Cockatiels Sun Parakeets Lovebird Green Cheek Conures African Grey Small Quaker Amazon Parrots with Rolling Stand, White
short_description: Large parrot cage: This spacious cage can house several small birds comfortably, suitable for families with more than one small/medium bird. It also serves perfectly as a sweet home for sugar gliders, chinchillas and other small animals.

Safe & Secure: 1cm/ 3/8″ bar spacing is suitable and safe for small/medium birds or small animals to use. The front door and feeder doors are all secured with locks, preventing your smart little pets from escaping and keeping them safe in the cage when you are not around.

Convenient maneuverability: The parrot cage comes with a stand that sits on four 360° swivel smooth-rolling casters for easy maneuverability. The detachable mobile stand can be easily removed if needed. Besides, you can even attach the casters to the bottom of the cage directly to make the cage mobile without a stand.

Practical mobile stand: The parrot cage is elevated on a 52.5cm/20.7” high rolling stand, which is around chest level, an ideal cage height for birds. The stand not only gives this item good maneuverability but also offers a perfect bird accessory space with its bottom storage shelf.

Clean with ease: A slide-out tray under the cage can be removed and cleaned with water. A grate between pets and the tray can avoid your pets walking/laying directly on their droppings, which ensures your pets’ health and the tidiness of the cage.
